mapper.select: SELECT mpr.ranking, mpr.PRODUCT_ID, p.NAME, p.main_img_url, p.main_category_code, mpr.SALES_VOLUME, mpr.SALES_VOLUME * p.price AS SALES_AMOUNT FROM MONTHLY_PRODUCT_RANKING mpr JOIN PRODUCT p ON mpr.PRODUCT_ID = p.id WHERE mpr.MONTHLY = CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) = 1 THEN (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - 1) || '/12' ELSE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) || '/' || (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE)-1) END order by mpr.ranking FETCH FIRST 10 rows only;
